stereo.tools.DimReduce¶

class stereo.tools.DimReduce(data, method='pca', n_pcs=2, min_variance=0.01, n_iter=250, n_neighbors=5, min_dist=0.3, inplace=False, name='dim_reduce')¶

bin-cell dimensionality reduction

__init__(data, method='pca', n_pcs=2, min_variance=0.01, n_iter=250, n_neighbors=5, min_dist=0.3, inplace=False, name='dim_reduce')¶

initialization

Parameters

  • data (AnnData) – anndata object

  • method – default pca, options are pca, tsen, umap, factor_analysis and low_variance

  • n_pcs – the number of features for a return array after reducing.

  • min_variance – minus variance

  • n_iter – number of iteration

  • n_neighbors – number of neighbors

  • min_dist – param for UMAP method, the minus value of distance.

  • inplace – inplace the input anndata if True

  • name – name of this tool and will be used as a key when adding tool result to andata object.

Methods

__init__(data[, method, n_pcs, …])

initialization

add_result(result[, key_added])

add the result of analysis into anndata , which is be added in AnnData.uns[key_added]
